subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Virginia’s Michael Rocco found tight end Jake McGee for a 6-yard touchdown with 1 minute 28 seconds remaining, and Penn State’s Sam Ficken missed a 42-yard field goal as time expired.
snippet: Virginia’s Michael Rocco found tight end Jake McGee for a 6-yard touchdown with 1 minute 28 seconds remaining, and Penn State’s Sam Ficken missed a 42-yard field goal as time expired.
